FM meets assistant president of IFAD
     Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met and had a talk with Takao Shibata, assistant president of the International Fund for Agricultural Development, and his party, who arrived here and paid a courtesy call on him today.
